general.descriptionTextModule: The administration's front page, displaying statistics and system information

welcome.subHeader: We are glad to have you here!
welcome.text: This is where you start discovering the new Shopware generation.
welcome.subText: We are looking forward to your feedback!
welcome.subSubText: In the meantime, take a peek at what lies ahead. Our dedicated roadmap will keep you up to date with the latest developments regarding Shopware.

migration.description: Discover Shopware and start off with something familiar - your own data! Together we will connect your Shopware 5 data and to Shopware 6. Afterwards you will be able to migrate your data. A migration assistant we'll be at your side and help guide you through the process.
